collections.name: institution_details

properties.name: unitid
properties.description: Unique Education Unit ID number for the institution.

properties.name: chronname
properties.description: The name of the institution.

properties.name: city
properties.description: The city where the institution is located.

properties.name: state
properties.description: The state where the institution is located.

properties.name: level
properties.description: The level of the institution, indicating the highest degree offered.

properties.name: control
properties.description: The control or ownership of the institution (e.g., public, private).

properties.name: basic
properties.description: Carnegie Foundation for the Advancement of Teaching Basic Classification (2010 version).

properties.name: hbcu
properties.description: Indicates if the institution is a Historically Black College or University (HBCU). 'X' denotes true.

properties.name: flagship
properties.description: Indicates if the institution is a public flagship institution. 'X' denotes true.

properties.name: long_x
properties.description: The longitude of the institution's location.

properties.name: lat_y
properties.description: The latitude of the institution's location.

properties.name: site
properties.description: The website address of the institution.

properties.name: student_count
properties.description: Total number of undergraduate students in 2010.

properties.name: awards_per_value
properties.description: Completions per 100 FTE (full-time equivalency) undergraduate students, averaged over 2011, 2012, and 2013.

properties.name: awards_per_state_value
properties.description: The average number of completions per 100 FTE undergraduate students for the institution's state and sector.

properties.name: awards_per_natl_value
properties.description: The national average number of completions per 100 FTE undergraduate students for the institution's sector.

properties.name: exp_award_value
properties.description: Estimated educational spending per academic award (including all certificates and degrees) in 2013.

properties.name: exp_award_state_value
properties.description: The average spending per completion for the institution's state and sector.

properties.name: exp_award_natl_value
properties.description: The national average spending per completion for the institution's sector.

properties.name: exp_award_percentile
properties.description: The institution's percentile rank for educational spending per award within its sector.

properties.name: ft_pct
properties.description: The percentage of undergraduate students who attend full-time.

properties.name: fte_value
properties.description: The total number of full-time equivalent (FTE) undergraduate students.

properties.name: fte_percentile
properties.description: The institution's percentile rank for the number of full-time equivalent undergraduates within its sector.

properties.name: med_sat_value
properties.description: The median estimated SAT score for incoming students.

properties.name: med_sat_percentile
properties.description: The institution's percentile rank for median SAT value within its sector.

properties.name: aid_value
properties.description: The average amount of financial aid provided to undergraduate recipients.

properties.name: aid_percentile
properties.description: The institution's percentile rank for the average amount of student aid within its sector.

properties.name: endow_value
properties.description: The end-of-year endowment value per full-time equivalent student.

properties.name: endow_percentile
properties.description: The institution's percentile rank for endowment value per FTE student within its sector.

properties.name: grad_100_value
properties.description: The percentage of first-time, full-time, degree-seeking undergraduates who complete their program within 100% of the expected time.

properties.name: grad_100_percentile
properties.description: The institution's percentile rank for completion within 100% of normal time, within its sector.

properties.name: grad_150_value
properties.description: The percentage of first-time, full-time, degree-seeking undergraduates who complete their program within 150% of the expected time.

properties.name: grad_150_percentile
properties.description: The institution's percentile rank for completion within 150% of normal time, within its sector.

properties.name: pell_value
properties.description: The percentage of undergraduate students receiving a Pell Grant.

properties.name: pell_percentile
properties.description: The institution's percentile rank for the percentage of undergraduate Pell Grant recipients within its sector.

properties.name: retain_value
properties.description: The share of freshman students who are retained for a second year.

properties.name: retain_percentile
properties.description: The institution's percentile rank for freshman retention percentage within its sector.

properties.name: ft_fac_value
properties.description: The percentage of employees devoted to instruction, research, or public service who are full-time and do not work for an associated medical school.

properties.name: ft_fac_percentile
properties.description: The institution's percentile rank for its share of full-time faculty within its sector.

properties.name: vsa_year
properties.description: Most recent year of Student Success and Progress Rate data available from the Voluntary System of Accountability (VSA).

properties.name: vsa_grad_after4_first
properties.description: Percentage of first-time, full-time students who graduated from this institution within four years.

properties.name: vsa_grad_elsewhere_after4_first
properties.description: Percentage of first-time, full-time students who graduated from another institution within four years.

properties.name: vsa_enroll_after4_first
properties.description: Percentage of first-time, full-time students who were still enrolled at this institution after four years.

properties.name: vsa_enroll_elsewhere_after4_first
properties.description: Percentage of first-time, full-time students who were enrolled at another institution after four years.

properties.name: vsa_grad_after6_first
properties.description: Percentage of first-time, full-time students who graduated from this institution within six years.

properties.name: vsa_grad_elsewhere_after6_first
properties.description: Percentage of first-time, full-time students who graduated from another institution within six years.

properties.name: vsa_enroll_after6_first
properties.description: Percentage of first-time, full-time students who were still enrolled at this institution after six years.

properties.name: vsa_enroll_elsewhere_after6_first
properties.description: Percentage of first-time, full-time students who were enrolled at another institution after six years.

properties.name: vsa_grad_after4_transfer
properties.description: Percentage of full-time transfer students who graduated from this institution within four years.

properties.name: vsa_grad_elsewhere_after4_transfer
properties.description: Percentage of full-time transfer students who graduated from another institution within four years.

properties.name: vsa_enroll_after4_transfer
properties.description: Percentage of full-time transfer students who were still enrolled at this institution after four years.

properties.name: vsa_enroll_elsewhere_after4_transfer
properties.description: Percentage of full-time transfer students who were enrolled at another institution after four years.

properties.name: vsa_grad_after6_transfer
properties.description: Percentage of full-time transfer students who graduated from this institution within six years.

properties.name: vsa_grad_elsewhere_after6_transfer
properties.description: Percentage of full-time transfer students who graduated from another institution within six years.

properties.name: vsa_enroll_after6_transfer
properties.description: Percentage of full-time transfer students who were still enrolled at this institution after six years.

properties.name: vsa_enroll_elsewhere_after6_transfer
properties.description: Percentage of full-time transfer students who were enrolled at another institution after six years.

properties.name: similar
properties.description: A pipe-separated list of unitid's for institutions considered similar based on factors like size, sector, and student demographics.

properties.name: state_sector_ct
properties.description: The number of institutions in the same state and sector.

properties.name: carnegie_ct
properties.description: The number of institutions in the same Carnegie Classification category.

properties.name: counted_pct
properties.description: The percentage of students in the entering class who are first-time, full-time, and degree-seeking, making them part of the official graduation rate cohort.

properties.name: nicknames
properties.description: Common nicknames or abbreviations for the institution.

properties.name: cohort_size
properties.description: The size of the graduation cohort being tracked.

collections.description: Provides detailed information about individual educational institutions, including location, type, student demographics, and various performance metrics.

extra semantic info.commonsense evidence: The latitude (lat_y) and longitude (long_x) together form the institution's geographic coordinates.

completion_rate_comparison.state_level: If an institution's completion rate (awards_per_value) exceeds the average for its state and sector (awards_per_state_value), it performs better than its local peers. If it falls below, it underperforms.
completion_rate_comparison.national_level: If an institution's completion rate (awards_per_value) exceeds the average for its national sector (awards_per_natl_value), it performs better than its national peers. If it falls below, it underperforms.

collections.name: institution_grads

properties.name: unitid
properties.description: Unique Education Unit ID number, linking to the institution.

properties.name: year_
properties.description: The year of the data release for the graduation cohort.

properties.name: gender
properties.description: The gender of the student cohort.

properties.name: race
properties.description: The race or ethnicity of the student cohort.

properties.name: cohort
properties.description: The type of degree-seeking cohort being tracked.

value_mapping.4y other: Students seeking other degrees or certificates at 4-year institutions

properties.name: grad_cohort
properties.description: The number of first-time, full-time, degree-seeking students in the tracked cohort, minus exclusions.

properties.name: grad_100
properties.description: The number of students from the cohort who graduated within 100% of the normal/expected time.

properties.name: grad_150
properties.description: The number of students from the cohort who graduated within 150% of the normal/expected time.

properties.name: grad_100_rate
properties.description: The percentage of students from the cohort who graduated within 100% of the normal/expected time.

properties.name: grad_150_rate
properties.description: The percentage of students from the cohort who graduated within 150% of the normal/expected time.

collections.description: Contains graduation statistics for individual institutions, broken down by year, cohort, gender, and race.

collections.name: state_sector_details

properties.name: stateid
properties.description: The state's Federal Information Processing System (FIPS) code.

properties.name: state
properties.description: The name of the state.

properties.name: state_post
properties.description: The postal abbreviation for the state.

properties.name: level
properties.description: The level of institutions in this sector (e.g., 4-year, 2-year).

properties.name: control
properties.description: The control or ownership type of institutions in this sector (e.g., public, private).

properties.name: schools_count
properties.description: The number of schools within this state and sector.

properties.name: counted_pct
properties.description: The percentage of students in the entering class who are first-time, full-time, and degree-seeking, making them part of the official graduation rate.

properties.name: awards_per_state_value
properties.description: The average number of completions per 100 FTE undergraduate students for this state and sector.

properties.name: awards_per_natl_value
properties.description: The national average number of completions per 100 FTE undergraduate students for this sector.

properties.name: exp_award_state_value
properties.description: The average spending per completion for this state and sector.

properties.name: exp_award_natl_value
properties.description: The national average spending per completion for this sector.

properties.name: state_appr_value
properties.description: State appropriations to higher education per resident in fiscal year 2011.

properties.name: state_appr_rank
properties.description: The state's rank for appropriations to higher education.

properties.name: grad_rate_rank
properties.description: The state's rank for graduation rate.

properties.name: awards_per_rank
properties.description: The state's rank for awards per 100 FTE students.

collections.description: Aggregated statistics and rankings for educational institutions, grouped by state and sector (e.g., Public 4-year, Private 2-year).

collections.name: state_sector_grads

properties.name: stateid
properties.description: The state's Federal Information Processing System (FIPS) code.

properties.name: state
properties.description: The name of the state.

properties.name: state_abbr
properties.description: The postal abbreviation of the state.

properties.name: control
properties.description: The control or ownership type of institutions in this sector (e.g., public, private).

properties.name: level
properties.description: The level of institutions in this sector (e.g., 4-year, 2-year).

properties.name: year_
properties.description: The year of the data release for the graduation cohort.

properties.name: gender
properties.description: The gender of the student cohort.

properties.name: race
properties.description: The race or ethnicity of the student cohort.

properties.name: cohort
properties.description: The type of degree-seeking cohort being tracked.

value_mapping.4y other: Students seeking other degrees or certificates at 4-year institutions

properties.name: grad_cohort
properties.description: The total number of students in the tracked cohort for this state and sector.

properties.name: grad_100
properties.description: The number of students from the cohort who graduated within 100% of the normal/expected time.

properties.name: grad_150
properties.description: The number of students from the cohort who graduated within 150% of the normal/expected time.

properties.name: grad_100_rate
properties.description: The percentage of students from the cohort who graduated within 100% of the normal/expected time.

properties.name: grad_150_rate
properties.description: The percentage of students from the cohort who graduated within 150% of the normal/expected time.

properties.name: grad_cohort_ct
properties.description: The number of institutions with data included in this cohort.

collections.description: Aggregated graduation statistics grouped by state, sector, year, and various demographic categories.

relationships.name: institution_grads
relationships.description: Retrieves all graduation statistic records for this institution.

relationships.name: institution_detail
relationships.description: Retrieves the institution associated with these graduation statistics.

relationships.name: state_sector_grads
relationships.description: Retrieves all graduation statistic records for this state and sector.

relationships.name: state_sector_detail
relationships.description: Retrieves the state and sector details associated with these graduation statistics.

relationships.name: institutions
relationships.description: Retrieves all institutions belonging to this specific state and sector.

relationships.name: state_sector_detail
relationships.description: Retrieves the state and sector details for this institution.
